channel.title: Server Update?
channel.description: Will MoparCraft (server) be updated with 1.8 when it comes out or not? I'm not sure because i don't know much about the Bukkit or whatever it's called.

item.title: Server Update?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

RainbowFire:

Ok, sorry i parsed the question wrong. :eek: I wanted to would MoparCraft be updated.

no youre parsing our answers wrong THE MOPARCRAFT SERVER WILL BE UPDATED WHEN THE DEVELOPERS OF BUKKIT, THE SERVER SOFTWARE MOPARCRAFT RUNS OFF OF, UPDATE AND FIX THE BUGS FOR THEIR SOFTWARE

I honestly dont know how i can make it anymore clear

Read full topic

item.title: Server Update?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

RainbowFire:

That’s why I started this post. I wanted to know if the server would be updated right after the update or not.

yes the server will be updated but not until the actual server software developers can release a stable build

Waiting for a stable version of bukkit and for plugin updates etc

item.title: Server Update?
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:9, topic:414340”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=516299.msg3749739#msg3749739 date=1315950578]

I do but did you know i don’t have all the time in the world. I don’t have very much time at all. Minecraft is played during my free time. You don’t have to be insulting.

You mustve had free time when you posted this topic which you could have used to to be reading up in this section
[/quote]
wow go outside and get a life n00b, get a girlfriend a job smoke some weed there’s more to the world than minecraft[/quote]

You mean there is a world outside of minecraft?? :o I must go find this magical place.

lol jk…incase you couldn’t tell
